Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 56 YO white male indicates mild problem with seeing at night and mild deterioration of eye sight. denies any smoking he drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 71 in, Weight 184 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

s:pt describes mild deterioration of eye sight and mild problem with seeing at night. he is a 57 yr old male consultant. Patient does not smoke he reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 70 in, Weight 181 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 14 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
